title: The Power of Fascination / Non-Verbal Hypnosis / Dr. Paret
description:
Icreased hypnotic flexibility with the power of the gaze. Open-eyed trance through Fascination, induced by Dr.Paret.You will see that there are no limits to the flexibility of the human body under a hypnotic trance. All these proprietary techniques are taught exclusively at Dr. Paret's school.

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
